DESCRIPTION.P: produces two matrices L and U such that A = L*U with U upper triangular and E*L lower triangular for a permutation matrix E.
If A has rank k, rows k+1 to n of U are zero.
produces three matrices L, U and E such that E*A = L*U with U upper triangular and E*L lower triangular for a permutation matrix E.

MAN.USED_FUNCTION: lu decompositions are based on the Lapack routines DGETRF for real matrices and ZGETRF for the complex case.
